This was released in 2004, and it still holds up well today.

i started playing because of the reviews.
5 minutes into the game and all the bad guys want me dead, i have no idea why though i keep running.
2 hours in, and i have only little more idea as to why and where i'm going to though at this point i'm speeding in my cool hoverboat and having a great time. the game keeps getting better and never gets tiring.
the graphics are surprisingly passable for a game made so long ago and all other aspects (ai, physics, weapons) are great.
i had great time playing this, highly recommended
Rise and shine Mr. Freeman, rise and shine.

Half Life 2 continues to amaze and ist still more than playable in its 17th year after release. 
For those of you who have started their VR journey and palyed Half-Life: Alyx, holding that crowbar in your hands again, after all those years, can send shivers down your spine.

In my eyes a masterpiece. Nothing less.

Toujours aussi trippant malgré les années.

Very good game despite the age of it.
its good but a lot of the time i didn't know where to go but its still very fun

Excellent game, and still holds up after 16 years. Visuals are great, sound design is excellent, and the game is super smooth as expected with the source engine. Menu UI doesn't scale well, but in-game HUD scaled perfectly in 4k.

Ein würdiger Nachfolger! Ich hätte mir zwar etwas mehr Anschluss zum ersten Teil gewünscht, doch das Spiel ist verdammt abwechslungsreich und die Grafik ist für das Alter grandios. Hat mir sehr viel Spaß gemacht. Der die ganze Half-Life Serie ist einfach ein Klassiker und ein Must-Have!

Half-Life 2 es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia dentro y fuera de la industria del gaming 

Situado muchos años despues del primero G-man despertara a freeman de su sueño en suspension para pedirle sus servicios en este caso ayudar a la resistencia a liberar a la tierra de la raza alienigena combine


Jugablemente al dia de hoy lo veo hermoso cambio muchisimo desde el 1 ademas de que graficamente cambio obviamente 

La banda sonora uufff amigo podria bajarme todas las canciones del juego y escucharlas todo el dia 

La historia esta bien escrita y aunque el final se deja abierto se continua con las expanciones de episodio 1 y el ultimo episodio el 2 que mataria a la saga durante años hasta la llegada del HL alyx y los remakes echos por los fans que es el black mesa 


Por muy poco que conte Half-Life 2 al dia de hoy es hermoso y como dije uno de los mejores juegos de la historia del gaming


11/10 capo compralo y jugate todos los Half-Life lo vas a pasar bien, ademas que lo disfrute desde el dia de su lanzamiento para mi un juego que tiene un lugar en mi corazon

Half-Life 2 :>

This game Is wonderful, I enjoyed so much about this game heres a list of 5 things I liked about the game.
*Scenery the maps look really good and the enviromental story telling.
*Gameplay the puzzles in this game can get you confused and get your last braincells.
*Combat (yes i know this is gameplay) the combat is pretty good with some minor issues here and there but other wise it feels very fleshed out.
*Music the soundtrack is good with some pretty groovy beats here and there.
*Optimization this game was optimized well with each area being loaded in apart instead of chapters being one whole area which is why the loading screens exist not just in between chapters.

loved this game. 10/10

Half-Life 2... wow. This is how you learn from mistakes and improve upon them. Valve clearly made the right decisions with the 'new' Source engine compared to the GoldSrc engine the original Half-Life. Graphics are great and Gameplay is "Out of this world".
Graphics - while a little aged - are great. each character feels like a person and the engine does a great job of conveying emotion, with assistance of the brilliant VO provided by the actors. Physics provided by the engine is incredible, and really allows for amazing gameplay options, but can sometimes be a little buggy.
Gameplay is nice and smooth, with the physics of the gravity gun offering a new variable to combat, a truly creative and amazing way to improve the game. While the diversity of weapons has decreased since the original Half-Life, weapons are better, as they 'feel' like they actually have weight and knockback, unlike in the original.
Overall, this game is truly amazing, deserving of all the praise it receives, and a great improvement over the original game.
Half-Life 2 gets an 8/10.

For more reviews check my Steam profile
Hope you enjoyed my review, god bless you
Не много однообразная, но в целом, отличная. Даже в 20 году. 9 дилдо из 10.

Игра, конечно, хорошая, но вот у меня такой вопрос к разработчикам: когда уже выйдет Half-Life 3?

Сколько Гордон Фримен пробыл в стазисе? Двадцать? Двадцать пять лет? После событий в научном центре «Черная Меза» мир изменился не в лучшую сторону. Человечество на грани вымирания. Мир снова нуждается в его помощи. Так проснитесь же, мистер Фримен… Проснитесь, вас снова ждут великие дела.
После четвёртого прохождения Half-life 2, я решил, что хотел бы поделиться с вами своими мыслями о ней. Сразу скажу, я не написал ничего нового о Half-life 2, просто потому что это невозможно. Однако в чём секрет Half-life 2? За что люди так сильно любят Half-life 2? Почему она считается лучшим шутером от первого лица и почему многие ждут её третьей итерации.
my favorite game of all time. still absolutely incredible, even in 2021.

This game is an asbsolute masterpiece of game design, and truly one of the defining FPS games. In my opinion, it's the greatest action-adventure game of all time, and although the level design is linear to a certain extent, it's so open it doesn't feel that way at all. It's a large and epic story, almost a road trip kind of story. And it proves Gordon Freeman is one of the greatest protagonists of all time, and he never even makes a grunt the entire series. 
Valve's best game in my opinion, although Portal and Left 4 Dead 1 & 2 are close contenders. I'd give it a 9.5/10, and an A+ if I graded them that way lol. 
Play this game as soon as you can.
un juego aun a 17 años de su salida
timeless class...still fun to play after all these years

Uno de los mejores FPS de la historia, un videojuego que explota todas sus capacidades para hacer sentir al jugador que el mundo que ofrece realmente está vivo, que todo objeto realmente está sujeto a las leyes de la gravedad, y sobre todo, que hace sentir al jugador realmente en la historia, la cual narra excelentemente.
Puntaje: 9/10.
